meanings.definition: Relating to the ancient Egyptian city of Amarna.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologists discovered ancient amarna artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The guide explained the significance of the amarna ruins.
meanings.sent3: The amarna pottery made the historians chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had an amarna elegance to it.
meanings.sent5: The amarna hieroglyphs were beautifully preserved.

meanings.definition: A style of art or architecture associated with the reign of Akhenaten in Amarna.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed exquisite amarna sculptures.
meanings.sent2: Art students studied the unique characteristics of amarna.
meanings.sent3: The amarna paintings brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The building's design had a touch of amarna influence.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition showcased the beauty of amarna art.

meanings.definition: A period of Egyptian history during the reign of Akhenaten in Amarna.
meanings.sent1: Historians often discuss the significance of the amarna era.
meanings.sent2: Students learned about the events of the amarna period.
meanings.sent3: The amarna timeline was full of unexpected twists.
meanings.sent4: The amarna era marked a shift in Egyptian culture.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the mysteries of the amarna age is fascinating.
